content:
The AUPD Location Profile IG doesn't specify name as a searchable parameter... but I think it should be (and like organization, a name search should include alias). Any arguments against adding that?

And... am I right to be raising these boring-but-important IG things here? or is it best to just use the Issues and Feedback link on the Profile page itself? or both... discussion here, and then enter it into the IG page after consensus?

Happy both ways.
When reporting via the link to log the issue, if there is a standard search param include that in the notes (like there was with the org name search param)

cool. Regarding the standard search params listed on the FHIR base resources... what's the intent there: are those all intended to be mandatory? (in which case why are we publishing a smaller set on the AUPD profiles)
It's a recommended set, and provides a consistent definition when it's used. So what we are defining in the aupd spec are the mandatory ones for our use cases.
In AU PD there are SHOULD or MUST support indication on each search parameter included. Comment is welcome - we can put through the SM TWG to get general consensus to include content.
